data.title: Capital Projects
meta_keywords: South Dakota State University Athletics Development
data.meta_description: South Dakota State Back The Jacks
data.text:
To qualify for the reseat, you will need to make a deposit for the number of season tickets you intend to purchase up to four (4), plus enter a request for any additional tickets greater than four (4). You must have your deposit fully paid for by May 28, 2024.

After the seating reallocation is completed, you will be charged for balance on your account based on where you end up.

You will be sent an email that will confirm your time slot in late July of 2024 for the reallocation that will occur in August or September (based on majority of construction completed)

All fans will come into the newly renovated First Bank & Trust Arena to select your seats in person, during your allotted time slot.

Season ticket holders will need to arrive 15 minutes early to keep the process moving in an orderly fashion. If you are going to be late for your time slot and do not communicate ahead of time, you may risk getting bumped down a time slot.

You can designate someone to select the seats for you in person.

You will have ten minutes to select your seats. If you miss your timeslot, seats will be selected for you based on similar seating from previous years OR notes provided one in advance to athletics staff.

After selecting your seats, ticket office staff will greet you at checkout to pay the difference between your deposit and selected seats.

A maximum of four (4) deposits can be placed for basketball season tickets. If a season ticket holder wishes to purchase more than 4 season tickets, they will be able to request additional tickets, based on availability. SDSU Athletics would like to provide as many opportunities for fans to purchase season tickets as possible.

After the May 28th deposit deadline, SDSU Athletics will notify those who requested more than four (4) season tickets on the status of their request.

If a season ticket holder wishes to select four (4), Courtside, Midco Club, or lower-level premium seats and is allocated additional tickets, those tickets must be selected in the upper level. A maximum of eight (8) tickets can be selected during your allocation time slot. Additional tickets above eight (8) will be allocated after all season ticket holders have finished their seat selection process.

After the reseat is complete, tickets CANNOT be transferred to another account.

You will be sent an email that will confirm your time slot in late July of 2024 for the reallocation that will occur early August for Volleyball and September for Wrestling.

All fans will come into the newly renovated First Bank & Trust Arena to select your seats in person, during your allotted time slot.

Season ticket holders will need to arrive 15 minutes early to keep the process moving in an orderly fashion. If you are going to be late for your time slot and do not communicate ahead of time, you may risk getting bumped down a time slot.

You can designate someone to select the seats for you in person.

You will have ten minutes to select your seats. If you miss your timeslot, seats will be selected for you based on similar seating from previous years OR notes provided one in advance to athletics staff.

After selecting your seats, ticket office staff will greet you at checkout to pay the difference between your deposit and selected seats.
